trivia_items.text: Her codename is based on the horror movie/novel The Shining, fitting her overall Gothic style and her trait as a Sarkaz.
According to Arknights CN's 2nd Anniversary livestream, Shining's Silent Night DN02 outfit ranks first in the list of top 5 Operator outfits available at the Outfit Store.

It is implied throughout her file and the story that Shining is a very skillful swordswoman, yet she hides it even from Rhodes Island for an unknown reason. As such, she has become one of the operators wished by the Arknights community to have an alternate version where she uses her swordsmanship again.
